attributes.action: MPs should not get a pay rise until the economy grows more than 2.5% per year.
attributes.additional_details: Payment for results, not just for turning up.
attributes.background: Demonstrate the value they bring to the country by actually enabling the economy to grow significantly.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
